command: ffuf -t 40 -fc 404 -maxtime 7200 -rate 400 -v -timeout 20 -H "User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:109.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/117.0" -w _wordlist_ -u _target_/FUZZ -o _cleantarget_.json -od _cleantarget_ -of json ; if [ -f _cleantarget_.json ]; then ffufPostprocessing -result-file _cleantarget_.json -bodies-folder _cleantarget_ -delete-bodies -overwrite-result-file ; fi ; sudo rm -r _cleantarget_ ; if [ -f _cleantarget_.json ]; then jq -r ".. | .url? // empty" _cleantarget_.json | tee -a _output_/_cleantarget_ ; fi ; go clean -cache -modcache ; if [ -f _cleantarget_.json ]; then sudo rm _cleantarget_.json ; fi ; if [ -d /tmp ]; then sudo rm -rf /tmp/* ; fi
